sql.content: SELECT A.stockCode ,A.stockName FROM TStockInfoDayQFQ A WHERE A.stockDayNo = 1 <[ AND A.stockCode = ':QueryStockCode' ]> ORDER BY A.stockDay ,A.stockCode

SELECT I.stockCode ,I.stockName ,I.stockDay ,I.stockDayNo ,I.newPrice ,LEAST (A.minPrice ,B.minPrice ,C.minPrice ,D.minPrice ,E.minPrice ,F.minPrice ,G.minPrice ,H.minPrice ,I.minPrice) AS minPriceXDay ,GREATEST(A.maxPrice ,B.maxPrice ,C.maxPrice ,D.maxPrice ,E.maxPrice ,F.maxPrice ,G.maxPrice ,H.maxPrice ,I.maxPrice) AS maxPriceXDay FROM TStockInfoDayQFQ A ,TStockInfoDayQFQ B ,TStockInfoDayQFQ C ,TStockInfoDayQFQ D ,TStockInfoDayQFQ E ,TStockInfoDayQFQ F ,TStockInfoDayQFQ G ,TStockInfoDayQFQ H ,TStockInfoDayQFQ I WHERE A.stockCode = ':stockCode' AND B.stockCode = A.stockCode AND C.stockCode = A.stockCode AND D.stockCode = A.stockCode AND E.stockCode = A.stockCode AND F.stockCode = A.stockCode AND G.stockCode = A.stockCode AND H.stockCode = A.stockCode AND I.stockCode = A.stockCode AND B.stockDayNo = A.stockDayNo + 1 AND C.stockDayNo = A.stockDayNo + 2 AND D.stockDayNo = A.stockDayNo + 3 AND E.stockDayNo = A.stockDayNo + 4 AND F.stockDayNo = A.stockDayNo + 5 AND G.stockDayNo = A.stockDayNo + 6 AND H.stockDayNo = A.stockDayNo + 7 AND I.stockDayNo = A.stockDayNo + 8 <[ AND I.stockDay >= ':QueryStockDay' ]> ORDER BY I.StockDay
UPDATE TStockInfoDayQFQ SET k = :k ,d = :d ,j = :j WHERE stockCode = ':stockCode' AND StockDay = ':StockDay'
